plot outline: A village is set with mystery when a nightmarish incident happens. The Vivek (Character played by Mohammed Althaf) who is an engineering student gets dismissed and joins another college and he builds a special bike for his team project but where did he get all the money from?. When the love relation between Vivek and Smitha is ruptured he finds all the answer for the riddle in the story.
title: Vakathirivu
plot: The story revolves around certain interesting incidents in the life of an engineering student named Vivek.

A village is set with mystery when a nightmarish incident happens. The Vivek (Character played by Mohammed Althaf) who is an engineering student gets dismissed and joins another college and he builds a special bike for his team project but where did he get all the money from?. When the love relation between Vivek and Smitha is ruptured he finds all the answer for the riddle in the story.::Blackcat Entertainments [in]
